listing.listing_description:
Just 20 minutes from the airport, you’ll find this tranquil getaway overlooking idyllic rice fields. Sitting on 5,300 square meters of landscaped gardens and close to the beach, this home blends classic Balinese architecture with modern accents and is one of our top villas in Bali. The Indonesian island of Bali is a popular holiday destination thanks to its spectacular beaches, rich landscape and unique culture.

Spend a day lounging poolside on one of the cushioned chaise lounges under a sun umbrella, then enjoy some quiet time in the pool’s floating gazebo—it’s also a perfect spot for a massage. If you feel more like socializing, there’s a separate lounge bar with two adjoining terraces and a Bose sound system or grab one of the property’s mountain bikes and explore the area first hand.

The open-sided living and dining area sits in a separate pavilion, and features comfy, colorful sofas and modern artwork that includes funky sculptures and Indonesian artifacts. You’ll also find a fully equipped kitchen in this space that is outfitted with all the appliances you need for a home-cooked meal—but you won’t need to lift a finger, there’s an on-site chef and butler service included in your stay. Enjoy meals in the upper-level dining area or out overlooking the pool.

Up to 14 guests are able to comfortably stay the night in this estate. There are six dedicated bedrooms as well as a study that can be converted into an additional bedroom if needed. All rooms include en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, televisions with DVD players and small fridges, while the two master suites offer king size beds.

As a guest at Chalina, you’ll be only 2 km to Echo beach, where you can sunbathe or try out surfing. It’s also 8 km to Tanah Lot Sea Temple, a major tourist attraction and Nirwana Bali Golf Club, considered to be one of the best in Asia.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Mid-century cool meets ultra modern design at this gallery-like masterpiece of a home in Gerringong. Rising out of the surrounding farmland like a periscope, the villa commands views across Werri Beach, framing coastal vistas in its windows like paintings in frames. It sits on 150 private acres, but it’s only steps away from the Kiama Coastal Walk, which winds past blowholes and rock formations. 

Though it presents an imposing face toward the ocean, the villa curves around a welcoming interior courtyard on the other side, where you’ll find a heated swimming pool and a lush lawn, bordered by a terrace. Ask to use the gas barbecue or watch the stars come out from around the fire pit. 

The property is laid out over a main house and a guest house known as The Range. Each has its own living areas and fully equipped kitchen, but both share the villa’s signature style: simple, pared-down spaces, edged by floor-to-ceiling glass and filled with sculptural pieces like mod loungers and a Malm fireplace. 

Rolling hills running down to the sea speak to the area’s farming heritage. Get closer to the landscape on a stroll to the Kiama Coastal Walk, where you can hike to a river for a picnic or to a café for lunch, or on a 2-minute walk to Werri Beach, where you can swim, surf, or pick up fish and chips from the local favorite shop on the beach. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend your trip to the Indonesian isle of Bali in sheer luxury at Villa Ramadewa, a three-bedroom home located in the lovely Petitenget district. Villa Ramadewa accommodates up to six individuals of discerning taste and offers an amazing architectural blend incorporating contemporary urbane motifs with traditional Balinese elements. Designed by Dutch architect Joost Van Grieken, this villa has been featured in lifestyle and travel magazines and has become a dream for elite travelers.

Villa Ramadewa offers guests a 24/7 butler service, housekeeping and a gourmet chef throughout their stay. Outdoors, there is a large swimming pool surrounded by charming gardens and a stylish furnished terrace with an elegant alfresco dining area. The inside of the home boasts amazing features, such as a dedicated music control room with a centralized iPad-controlled Bose sound system, which is active throughout the building. The house is also awash in premier Apple technology including an iMac, Apple TVs and iPods in every room.

The interior of Villa Ramadewa is simply stunning. The huge living pavilion with high-vaulted ceilings feature beautiful antiques and Indonesian cultural artifacts that will leave guests fascinated by the magic of this part of the world. The fully-equipped gourmet kitchen boasts a large breakfast bar and an adjacent temperature-controlled wine room.

Guests staying here will find that their en-suite sleeping quarters are immersed in stylish decor. For instance, the master suite located on the second level with a king size bed, provides an Apple TV, sound system, dressing room and even kimonos with slippers. The two ground level bedrooms each have queen size beds, floor-to-ceiling glass doors and ambient mood lighting. The en-suite bathrooms are stunning as they feature elements from the star designer Philippe Starcks’ renowned collection.

While Bali is immersed in ancient customs and practices, it is by a far a stranger to the modern world. For those who simply can’t get enough tee time, Nirwana Bali Golf Course is only a short drive away with fantastic fairways – a fun challenge for players of any level. While there, make sure to visit Tanah Lot, the amazing and deeply revered temple that has been built atop a magnificent stone archway high above the sea. Get the vacation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Como Park greenery waves in the surface of the infinity plunge pool at this sleek modern retreat just outside Melbourne. It’s beautifully designed—all open-plan spaces, glass walls, and polished concrete floors—but has a sense of humor that shows up in the built-in trampoline. Let loose in the park or take the tram to central Melbourne to visit its museums, gardens, and world-class coffee shops.

Tree-shaded decks make the park feel like your own private backyard. Turn flips on the trampoline, cool off in the plunge pool, serve dinner from the barbecue at the alfresco table for 6, and watch the stars come out from around the outdoor fireplace. On cooler evenings, find the wine cooler, fireplace, Apple TV, sound system, and Wi-Fi inside.

Cool tones of gray and white bring a serene feel to the open-concept great room, while a timber-paneled ceiling, sun-splashed glass wall, and copper fireplace have the warmth to balance it out. The sitting area has an inviting sectional, the dining table seats 8, and the fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar.

This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with queen beds: 2 with ensuite bathrooms, including the master bedroom, and one that shares a bathroom with the fourth bedroom, which has 2 twin beds. The shared-bathroom setup makes it ideal for a family on holiday with younger children.

With Como Park next door, you have the luxury of popping over for a stroll with your morning coffee or an evening constitutional. Walk to nearby Como House and Garden for a peek into the Australia of the 1850s, and into Toorak for shopping and dining. Join locals—including a clutch of resident penguins—at St Kilda Beach, and take the tram from South Yarra into central Melbourne for everything from a perfectly poured latte to a honeymoon-worthy multi-course dinner.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to forests of Eucalyptus, tropical gardens, and rare birds at this eco-friendly villa on the outskirts of Noosa. You'll want to pack a pair of binoculars and a camera while you're exploring this property. When you're waiting for the birds to appear, sit back and enjoy the jets in the swim/spa hot tub. Ready to emerge from the forest? Sunshine Beach and downtown Noosa are 6 minutes away.

Thanks to wall-length openings on parallel sides, this modern architectural home lets you feel the fresh breeze while you're at the kitchen bar or on the sofa by the fireplace. With furnished outdoor lounge areas on both sides of the warm-wood-floored great room, your dinner parties will know no boundaries. And, shuttered-windows in each bed and bathroom ensure you're never far from a great view.

Start each day with an Espresso in the garden, then step into the walk-in pantry for breakfast ideas. When the rest of the gang is up, gather around the breakfast bar in the open concept kitchen for some bacon and eggs from Noosa Farmer's Market. Pick-up some fresh fish as well for a lunchtime barbeque. And, if you need to keep up with work, Wi-Fi and office space should help.

Australia is a great place to try scuba diving, snorkeling, or surfing, especially on the Sunshine Coast. Charter a private yacht to explore the coast from another angle or see if you can catch your dinner at Noosa Fishing and Crab Adventures. If fishing doesn't work, 1 of Australia's most acclaimed chef's, Peter Kuruvita, serves delicious dishes made from local ingredients at Noosa Beach House.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Gorgeous Fairway Villa 104D is part of the inimitable Hualalai Resort, where everything is on hand for your perfect Hawaiian escape.

Your private two bedroom villa commands an impressive upper level view of the 15th tee of the Hualalai Golf Course while beyond you can admire Mauna Kea, Island of Maui and horizon views of the ocean. Designed by Honolulu-based Architect, Warren Sunnland, your spacious and modern villa is accented with local artwork and wood fittings. Vaulted ceilings make for airy spaces, while sliding doors allow you to easily let the outside in or step out to enjoy the exceptional Hawaiian climate. Everything is here to make your stay relaxing and includes a fully equipped gourmet kitchen with breakfast bar and dining area with seating for four guests. Your inviting and luxurious living space includes Television and DVD player, Wi-Fi, air conditioning and washer/dryer. Outside you’ll discover the private lanai entertaining area where you can enjoy alfresco dining and barbecue any time of the day while taking in spectacular views. There are also one golf cart for your exclusive use and a single garage.

Perfectly positioned to make the most of the superb Hualalai Resort facilities, it’s ideal for families with young children who may still be in the napping stage! You can easily check on them while you relax on your private lanai. In addition to the variety of pools you can choose from, you’ll enjoy the closeness of the villa to the Waiulu Community Pool - just cross the driveway for a refreshing late-afternoon dip.

Your comfortable and luxurious bedding configuration features a Master with king bed and deluxe ensuite with both a tub and shower. Your second bedroom is conveniently fitted with twin beds and also features its own private en-suite. Both of these charming rooms include ceiling fans and air conditioning.

The Fairway Villas at Hualalai are located within walking distance from the Hualalai Trading Company, Sports Club & Spa, Hualalai Golf Course, Coffee Company and spectacular Four Seasons Resort Hotel. Nearby you’ll find a convenience market, shopping, tennis court, golf course and fitness facility. It is a 22 minute drive to Kona town and a 3 minute walk to Hualalai Resort Beach. Kona International Airport (KOA) is just 12 minutes’ drive away.

This property is compliant with Hawaii State Legislation (HB2078) for vacation rental accommodations, Lic#W92294683-1.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Refresh both body and spirit at Ke Ea Ola (Kauna'oa 1A). Named for the Hawaiian words meaning “breath of life,” this exclusive Big Island vacation rental is close to thrilling activities from snorkeling to boogie boarding, and has soul-stirring ocean and sunset views. Its location in the gated neighborhood of Kauna’oa means guests have access to the amenities of both the Mauna Kea Beach Hotel and the Hapuna Prince Hotel.

Guests of Ke Ea Ola (Kauna'oa 1A) are welcome at the shared Kauna’oa facilities, from the infinity pool and hot tub to the fitness center and three-hole golf practice course. To relax or entertain in private, simply step out to the villa’s backyard, which has lush tropical landscaping, a pool with waterfall feature and hot tub, and covered lanais with sitting and dining areas and a barbecue. Play a favorite album over the state-of-the-art sound system, or simply let the waves be the soundtrack to your holiday.

The villa’s newly renovated interiors embody modern island luxury, and more than 3,100 square feet of living space over two stories make this townhouse feel like a stand-alone home. Vaulted ceilings and pocket doors that open to the terrace keep the great room bright and airy, while finishes in warm mango and mahogany lend a welcoming vibe. The tuxedo-style sectional and round dining table are contemporary yet comfortable, and the fully equipped kitchen includes a convenient breakfast bar and wine fridge.

There are two bedrooms with king beds, two with two twin beds and three-and-a-half baths. Wood furnishings and trim and large windows or fold-away doors to the lanais give the bedrooms the same sunny, inviting appeal as the great room. In the bathrooms, you’ll find thoughtful details such as sizeable vanities and glassed-in showers.

With its postcard-perfect scenery and wealth of activities, the Big Island is an ideal destination for a fun-filled family vacation or warm-weather honeymoon. And guests of Ke Ea Ola are in the middle of it, with a beach just a short walk or golf cart ride away that’s great for swimming, snorkeling and sunbathing. Borrow kayaks and other water sports equipment from the resorts, book a catamaran cruise or paddleboard expedition or enjoy exclusive use of a country club that’s just for Kauna’oa owners and guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Let the Kohala Coast enchant you during a holiday at Ke Kailani (1C) at Mauna Lani. From its setting in an exclusive gated community at the Mauna Lani Resort, this Big Island vacation rental looks out over the golf course to the ocean and offers easy access to an oceanfront entertaining area. Reserve its three bedrooms for a Hawaiian escape with friends and family, or a tropical honeymoon.

Spend lazy days under the island sunshine swimming in the villa’s private pool, relaxing in the hot tub or trying out local seafood on the barbecue. In the evenings, pour a glass from the wine fridge, flip on the smart TV or catch up with the rest of the world via Wi-Fi. For your comfort and convenience, the home has air conditioning and laundry facilities.

Inside, Ke Kailani is all about relaxing across 3,000 square feet of space. A fold-away glass wall lets you open the great room of this luxury property to the outdoor living areas, while a double-height ceiling adds to the breezy feel. There’s ample seating in the living and dining areas, plus a breakfast bar along the granite countertop in the fully equipped kitchen.

The villa has two bedrooms in its main house: one with a California king bed and one with a king bed. The third bedroom is in a guest house and has a queen bed. All three bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms and open to a balcony or terrace.

Guests of Ke Kailani are welcome to use the community’s shared beach club, and can play on the Mauna Lani tennis courts or golf course at extra cost. The villa is also a 10-minute drive from popular Hapuna Beach and a short drive from a second golf course. If you’d like more shopping and dining options, drive to Waimea or take a day trip to downtown Kona.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located on New Zealand’s South Island, Queenstown is famous for adventure tourism and world class skiing. With Coronet Peak and The Remarkables just minutes away, this luxury rental puts you right where the action is.

With so many exciting activities, you’re bound to want some relaxation time. There’s no better place than a hot tub with a mountain view, or maybe a Kiwi style barbeque and a glass of wine to end a busy day. Inside Forty Two you’ll find formal dining for eight, a beautiful lounge with Sky TV and a fireplace, an office with a computer, a fully equipped kitchen and so much more.

What makes Forty Two a unique vacation rental? Its ingredients: wood, stone, stainless steel, floor-to-ceiling windows, and contemporary modern architecture. Together these elements give the perfect urban ski chalet feel. Curl up on the couch beside a roaring log fire; gaze out over Lake Wakatipu and onto The Remarkables mountain range. Appreciating the nature and traditional style of this space is easy. Moving from the living room to the galley style kitchen is like stepping into the future. Top of the line appliances, a breakfast bar, and an amazing view make this luxury rental the perfect blend of contemporary functionality and comfort.

All of the bedrooms at Forty Two have a spectacular view of the mountains, an ensuite bathroom, dual vanity, NetFlix, television, and walk-in closets. The master has a king bed and a bath tub, the second bedroom has a queen bed, the third has two twins and the study’s couch pulls out into a double as well.

Aside from world class skiing, Queenstown has plenty of fun, interesting, and exhilarating tourist destinations just minutes away from your rental. Walk into town and explore local boutique shops, fine dining, and bustling nightlife. Try your luck at Skycity Casino or take a stroll through Queenstown’s botanical gardens. Whatever your mood Forty Two has all your vacation needs covered.

listing.listing_description:
Contemporary chic and an excellent location help to ensure a fine way stay in this premium Balgowlah Heights townhouse. Take in a fine view of nearby Sydney Harbour from the balcony, before returning to the elegantly-outfitted and furnished interiors. Boasting a shimmering pool, and premium touches like a freestanding bath plus games room; local restaurants and the city itself are close by.

Located in one of Sydney's most historic suburbs, Balgowlah Villa provides everything and more for the small group seeking to both relax, and to experience Australia’s largest city. A refreshing morning swim, a stimulating coffee or juice on the airy balcony, or a fine breakfast on the sunny stone patio are options every day, while the ultra-modern and open plan kitchen ensures that whipping up meals is a treat. Relax for the evening in the sophistication of the softly-lit living room, or cross the herringbone floor to fix a delicious drink to savor in front of the glowing fireplace.

This villa’s location is ideal for those looking for a peaceful base, but one with snappy access to the real attractions of Sydney. Visit a plethora of locally owned and operated cafes, restaurants and bars within a short walk of the home, with a selection of convenient playgrounds, parks and fascinating lookout points nearby, on the Dobroyd headland. Guests have excellent access to the quaint surrounds of sandy Clontarf Beach, while the bright lights of downtown itself are less than 25 minutes by car.

listing.listing_description:
Make an award-winning residence the setting for a memorable holiday at Racquet Retreat. Tucked between the Noosa riverfront, a sandy beach and a jetty opposite the national park, this Queensland vacation rental boasts a one-of-a-kind location—and its modern architecture only adds to its charms.

Step past the walls of this estate and into what feels like your own private resort. Outside, there’s a boat dock on the river, a swimming pool, a hot tub, gas barbecue, and lounging and dining areas for you to enjoy, as well as a tennis court, as the villa’s name suggests. Inside, a home theater, bar area, pool table, streaming TV and Wi-Fi make entertaining and relaxing equally simple.

Fold-away glass walls perfectly frame the river views from the villa’s open-concept great room. The free-flowing space gets a cool, gallery-like vibe from its all-white color scheme and sculptural furnishings that’s balanced by the warmth of its wood accents. An inviting sitting area, dining table for ten and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar provide plenty of space to enjoy the company of friends and family.

This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds, en-suite bathrooms and balconies, including the master suite. There are also two sets of two bedrooms each with a king bed in one, two twin bunk beds in the other and a shared Jack and Jill style bathroom, perfect for parents traveling with younger children.

Though it’s known for its surfing, Noosa is also a wonderful area for other water sports and sunny family getaways. Racquet Retreat is only a 4-minute drive from Noosa Head Main Beach, whose relatively calm waters are ideal for children or beginner surfers, and a 10-minute drive or less from a choice of several other beaches. When you’re done laying on the sand or playing in the surf, it’s a 5-minute drive to everything from casual cafés and boutiques to honeymoon-worthy waterfront dinners in downtown Noosa Heads.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Blue Sky Villa in Maui has been designed and decorated to soothe your mind, body and soul. This magical villa brings you close to the setting of the ancient Hawaiian kings with architecture that swirls and soars in the manner of the ocean and sky before it. Within easy walking distance to Lahaina Town and a short drive to the beaches, Blue Sky Villa also offers a convenient location for exploring this spectacular island.

This resplendent villa features one of the finest lap pools in all of Hawaii. Step into the soothing bubbles of the outdoor hot tub for a special treat. Indoors, you will find a media room, Wi-Fi access, ceiling fans and laundry facilities. Step onto the splendid balcony and ascend the open air winding stairs to your private meditation tower reminiscent of an ancient castle suffused on all directions by ocean and mountain vistas including Lanai, Kahoolawe, and the sublime peaks and contours of Pu’u Kukui.

The grace and beauty of the outdoors at Blue Sky Villa are only matched by its pristine and vast interiors. This luxury house was built to enjoy the natural beauty and breezes of Maui, enabling the ultimate indoor/outdoor living experience. Doors fully retract in the master bedroom as well as the living and dining rooms. The living room features a white baby grand piano that awaits the life breath of music.

This villa includes a premiere master bedroom where one feels as though they are floating on a cosmic ship of azure. The refined luxury of the master bathroom will take your breath away. There are four additional bedrooms with equal comfort and four additional bathrooms. This villa accommodates up to twelve guests.

During your stay at Blue Sky Villa, you will be just a short drive away from Lahaina, Baby and Ka’anapali beaches. Both surfers and golfers will be in paradise as they explore their options in this iconic landscape. Nearby Lahaina is a heritage town transformed into a modern Maui hot spot. Lahaina offers a variety of unique art galleries, shops and restaurants. A historic 1800s whaling village, this area has been immortalized by Herman Melville in the classic Moby Dick. The delights of Maui await!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Steal away in style at Mooloolaba. This water-view vacation rental on Australia’s Mooloolah River is a beautifully designed haven whose spectacular architecture rivals the scenery outside. Reserve its three bedrooms for a beach getaway with family or friends, or book the whole luxury property for a chic honeymoon-esque escape.

Your holiday at Mooloolaba begins with a welcome basket, delivered in person upon your arrival. Should you need assistance (or inspiration) during your stay, a concierge is on call. While you’re at the villa, you can enjoy outdoor living areas with a plunge pool, gas barbecue, firepit and a dining table for six, as well as indoor amenities from an Apple TV and projector screen to a Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.

The Mooloolaba experience starts when you enter gardens planted with fig and tipuana trees, and continues in dramatic fashion once you’re inside. An eight-meter glass wall separates the open-plan great room from the terrace, letting you create one seamless indoor-outdoor living space. The sitting area is defined by its curved sunken sectional; in the dining area and fully equipped kitchen, textures of tallow wood, onyx and polished concrete make a chic statement.

The villa has two bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed and al-fresco bathtub and shower, and one with a queen bed. The third bedroom has a queen bed and access to a hallway bathroom.

Mooloolaba is a 2-minute walk from the white sands of Mooloolaba Spit Beach, and a short drive from two other beaches. By car, it’s less than 10 minutes to downtown Mooloolaba; shopping, dining and activities on The Wharf; and the Headland Golf Club. For a day trip, plan to head to the downtown of nearby Sunshine Coast or explore Mooloolah River National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Wake up early to watch the surfers catch their morning waves at this modern beachside apartment on the prestigious shores of Noosa Main Beach on Australia’s east coast. Have a quick breakfast on the terrace, maybe a “wake-up” dip the shared pool, and then take a few steps off the estate to the warm white sand. After you’ve spent some time working on your tan, head inland to downtown Noosa.

Sleek and stylish white interiors give this suite an elegant vibe, while touches of rustic wood and ocean-inspired art remind you to keep it light and relax in this breezy setting. Open concept design means you can watch a movie on the couch, make yourself a snack in the kitchen, and sit down to a family meal, and the ocean view is just a head turn away. 

This beachside suite comes with everything you’ll need to host special family dinners, casual barbeques, and late nights with friends. If you’re not feeling social, find a shady spot on the balcony to catch up on some reading or find a rugby match on the Smart TV. La Mer comes with 1 parking spot and shared access to their ocean-view swimming pool and hot tub. 

On one side, you’ve got Noosa Main Beach. On the other, an eclectic mix of cafes, art galleries, and restaurant/bars on the always buzzing Hastings Street. Before you venture out bar hopping, earn it with a hike through Noosa National Park, a round of golf at Peregian, or a walk across Forty Mile Beach. For dinner, Noosa Boathouse offers incredible views from its rooftop lounge on the river.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Combining countryside charm with seaside luxury, this hilltop villa is nestled amongst a rustling palm grove, serving as the perfect base for your stay in the Byron Bay area. Enjoy sweeping views of Australia’s easternmost tip, with private courtyard, pool and viewpoint terrace. Just a short drive from Byron Bay’s legendary beaches, guests can plan diverse outings in perfect comfort and seclusion.

Possibilities are at the heart of this villa’s appeal. Double veranda doors lead from sumptuous guest bedrooms to a pristine plunge pool and tree-ringed courtyard, complete with sun loungers. A fantastic view of the countryside is never more than a few steps away, with plantation-style windows and sheltered overhang providing a perfect view of cane fields that gently roll down towards the Coral Sea. Alfresco dining spots and outdoor furniture ensure guests can make the very most of this unparalleled vista, as animals graze and crops sway in the distance. 

Inside, guests can enjoy the towering stone fireplace, step-in-showers, and tasteful furnishings that add the extra touch to each stay. Guests will appreciate the fully-furnished kitchen, breakfast bar and supplied barbecue, with catering and housekeeping all available for pre-booking. Total privacy is core to what Toraja Roja can offer, with a separate studio bedroom and hideaway-style loveseat providing extra intimacy amongst peaceful surroundings.

From the vantage point of the villa, any kind of outing is possible. Guests will enjoy easy access to the Pacific Highway, and can plan trips to any of northern New South Wales’s charming towns, wildlife reserves and national parks - including the spectacular Minyan Falls. Similarly, guests can drop everything for a day on one of the region’s countless sun-kissed beaches, with renowned surfing, snorkeling, sailing, day-cruise and sea-sports activities all very close by.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Welcome to the old Oahu world of John Walker. A Scotsman who made his way to Hawaii as a young man in the 1870s, he become the contractor of choice for Queen Liliuokalani. Walker erected such notable buildings as the Bishop Museum and Honolulu Hale, or City Hall. John Walker’s inviting and innovative presence is felt in the structure of this Beach House, his favorite hideaway on Lanikai Beach.

The Main House at this seaside property features three bedrooms, a kitchen and a large great room with spacious accommodations for large gatherings. Steps away are the soft white sands of Lanikai Beach with access to the water right from the front lawn of Walker’s Lanikai Beach House. With a separate entry, the Guest Cottage located off the courtyard features a queen room and a small parlor with kitchenette, sleeping up to four. Another private entry boathouse sits above the garage, complete with its own living room, kitchen, bathroom and lanai. The boathouse also has a loft area with double bed that maybe used for young children, sleeping up to four.

The enchanting environment at Walker’s Lanikai Beach House transports you back to an era of graceful living, where the worries of the world are lost in the quiet lapping of the sea, the glistening of the sand and the sublimely restful surroundings. Enjoy the fully equipped kitchen, guest quarters and boat house, with elements of charm carefully preserved from a richly felt past. In the kitchen, enjoy stainless steel appliances, marble countertops and a breakfast bar—an exceptional environment for the culinary genius in your entourage.

Five delightful bedrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at Walker’s Lanikai Beach House. Step into the master suite with a king bed, ensuite bathroom, television and air conditioning. Framed by the turquoise waters that are below eye-level, you will feel as if you are floating on the pristine waters of the Pacific as you fall sound asleep.

One of the first homes to take advantage of Lanikai’s heavenly, reef-protected waters and natural stretch of white sand, John Walker’s Lanikai Beach House set the standard by which the surrounding community grew. With such glorious beach surroundings you can enjoy surfing, snorkeling, golfing and relaxing in the therapeutic Hawaiian sun. Walker’s is a quintessential Lanikai Beach House. If you are seeking a casual, relaxing getaway on the shores of one of the world’s best beaches, you’ve found it!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Lic#W-87402697-01

Non-Conforming Use Permit Number 90/TVU-0042

listing.listing_description:
The broad flanks and snow-capped peaks of The Remarkables are doubled in the glassy surface of Lake Hayes—and again in the glass front of this sharply designed Queenstown retreat. Built into the slope down to the water and covered in windows, the villa opens new panoramas on each of its 3 levels. Get close to the scenery on the walking trail around the lake, or drive to golf and skiing.

Alfresco sitting and dining areas give you the luxury of having a morning coffee or an evening glass of New Zealand wine within earshot of the lake lapping at the shore. If you’ve come for a ski holiday, end the day with a session in the outdoor hot tub instead, then cozy up to the fireplace to keep toes toasty.

The heart of this vacation rental is an open-concept great room with a wall of windows that runs parallel to the lake and mountains, inviting the outdoors in. Wood-paneled ceilings and an ochre sectional bring natural texture and color into the decor, and on the practical side, there’s plenty of seating at the dining table for 8 and a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

A stay at this villa makes it easy to go for a walk around the lake, try the cafes in the charming town center of Allentown, a former mining hub, and tee off at nearby golf courses. It’s also within day-trip distance of Queenstown and skiing at Coronet Peak and The Remarkables.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hit the beach with ease from this minimalistic townhouse on Australia’s Sunshine Coast in Noosa Heads. Work on your tan, cool off in the plunge pool or catch up on some reading, all while enjoying views of Sunshine Beach from the lower balcony. Wake up early to watch the sunrise from the east-facing balcony above. Then, stroll to Sunshine Beach, 4-minutes away or venture inland to downtown Noosa.

Celebrate your trip to Australia with an elegant family dinner in the formal dining area or fire up the grill outside and keep it casual. After dinner, fix yourself a much-deserved drink at the wet bar and lay back in a sun lounger as the sun sets. Inside, the soothing whites, warm wood toned furnishings, and the clutter-free environment will surely put the group in a relaxed state of mind. 

Pick up some fresh Mahi-mahi from a local market and let your inner chef run free with inspiration from the villa’s state of the art kitchen. Sip your morning Nespresso by the pool or stretch out inside and watch the Smart TV while you bask in the air conditioning. And, don’t be afraid to invite new friends over, there’s garage parking for 2 within this gated-property. 

Now is the time to finally try surfing; Sunshine Beach has ideal conditions and plenty of banks, so surf spots don’t get too crowded. After a lesson, head to the Surf Club for lunch, maybe a beer, and dine with your feet in the sand. Keep exploring the Sunshine Coast, and you’ll find countless beaches leading down to Brisbane, which is just over an hour’s drive. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover the ultimate South Pacific retreat at The BeacHouse. This spectacular oceanfront vacation rental is fronted by swaying palms and a white-sand beach—and it’s surrounded by the 225 acres of private island in Fiji’s Mamanuca chain that make up the Vomo Island Resort. It’s the perfect destination for a romantic getaway, a celebration with friends or a tropical wedding, and one of the only family-friendly private islands in the region.

Your holiday on Vomo Island includes all meals and certain beverages, butler service, and the use of watersports equipment, a gym, tennis courts and more. Borrow a stand-up paddleboard and glide across the water, or put on snorkeling gear to slip beneath the surface. The BeacHouse also has its own outdoor living areas with sitting and dining areas, a pool, a boma with a wood-burning oven and barbecue, and plenty of loungers in both sun and shade.

Taking inspiration from mid-century style, the villa is modern and sophisticated both inside and out. Stretch out on luxury handcrafted Dedon furniture on the decks or on the sleek sectional in the open-concept great room to the sounds of a favorite album on the Bose sound system. The space opens to the deck through a nearly wall-to-wall sliding glass door, so the warm breeze wafts over the sitting area to the fully equipped kitchen.

The three bedrooms at The BeacHouse are linked to the main living areas by airy passages, and rival any honeymoon suite with their king beds, en-suite bathrooms with al-fresco showers, lounge areas, private terrace access and ocean views.

With only one resort on Vomo Island, guests are welcome to roam the white-sand beaches, palm groves and hills. Join the daily guided snorkeling excursion and learn what lives in Fiji’s warm, clear waters, or glimpse Fijian culture at the manager’s cocktail hour on Thursday evenings. For a truly private island experience, book a day on neighboring Vomo Lailai. Resort staff will whisk you over with a picnic, a supply of champagne and a radio to call the boat back when you’re ready to return.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take in blue waves, green vegetation and serene surrounds at this east Bali villa, which offers an exceptional level of interior luxury. Awaken to bright, airy rooms with fine sea views, before relaxing on the rich stone terrace. The pool, rock-feature bathrooms, lush lawn and carved driftwood furniture give the home distinct character, with beaches, former palaces, and diving all nearby.

Kick off your mornings at Villa Gumamela with a refreshing dive under the shining surface of the lengthy garden pool. Drying off at the poolside recliners, guests can take in the long horizons and peaceful waters of Amuk Bay. Turning inside, the home offers a marriage between rich Balinese touches and modern contemporary, with richly carved wooden featuring contrasting with open spaces and rich, golden light. The rockface decor of the bathrooms add a sense of tropical isolation, with the outdoor dining table, shaded under the terrace overhanging, is ideal for groups looking to take in the sunny environment along with delicious meals.

Located in the quieter eastern side of the island, day trip options from Villa Gumamela are abundant. With scenic Mt Agung looking down, guests are minutes from popular beaches including Amed beach and sandy Perasi beach. Some of the best diving outings on the island are very close by, with sunken ships hosting fascinating marine life and corals in gorgeous blue water. The regal former palace at Ujung features networks of bridges, pools and gardens - a must-see for those interested in Bali’s unique heritage.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
European sophistication is tucked behind leafy hedges at this single-story home in the sought-after Melbourne suburb of Malvern. Rooms lined with oak floors and marble counters look out over a wrought-iron patio table that wouldn’t be out of place at a bistro in Provence, along with a spa-worthy plunge pool. It’s less than 10 minutes to a playground and the coffee shops in downtown Toorak. 

Your holiday at this luxury property begins with a personal welcome and a gourmet basket, and a concierge is on call throughout your stay. On sunny days, lie out on a lounger by the plunge pool or pick up fresh produce at the market to prep on the gas barbecue and serve at the alfresco table for 6. On cooler evenings, a media room, Apple TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi, and a fireplace will help you cozy up. 

This vacation rental is laid out along one central great room whose open-plan layout and whitewashed, vaulted ceiling give it an airy feel. The fireplace divides a sitting area with three inviting sofas from a dining area for 8 and a marble-splashed, fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. 

The villa has 2 bedrooms with private ensuite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The other 2 bedrooms share access to a hall bathroom and have a double bed and 2 twin beds, respectively. 

If you’ve brought the whole family to Australia, it’s an easy walk or quick drive to the playground at nearby Menzies Reserve and the picnic-friendly lawns of the Malvern Public Gardens. Drive into the nearby town of Toorak for a quick coffee, a tempting browse through its boutiques, or a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a local brasserie or steakhouse. It’s also an easy day trip to the museums of central Melbourne or sandy St Kilda Beach. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Welcome to your Maui dream home. Avalon by the Sea is a beautiful four-bedroom villa located in Kapalua, one of the most exclusive areas on the island. You’ll discover traditional Hawaiian design mixed with the finest contemporary amenities, surrounded by lush tropical gardens and majestic palms. The property sits on a bluff overlooking the 18th hole of the PGA Plantation Course, with sweeping views across manicured fairways to the rolling Pacific Ocean.

Three separate lanai patios and an expansive tiled terrace surround the crisp turquoise water of the swimming pool. Start each morning with an invigorating dip before retreating to a cushioned chaise longue to bathe in the abundant island sun. Under one lanai you’ll find a high-end gas grill. Sizzle up fresh surf n’ turf and enjoy it around the alfresco dining table. As dusk settles, blend up delicious island cocktails and ease into the hot tub for a soak under the stars.

Almost every room provides panoramic views. The open-plan main room houses the living and dining areas below a lofty ceiling. Light pours in through an invisible wall giving you full appreciation of the tasteful furnishings and colorful, contemporary art. In the living area, a soft wraparound sofa and armchairs with refined floral upholstery face a large flatscreen television. The elegant dining set is made of the most lovely dark wood and beautifully finished. The gourmet kitchen features deluxe appliances, natural stone surfaces and a cozy breakfast bar. Wi-Fi is accessible throughout the home.

All four bedrooms are individually decorated with fine linens, beautiful furniture and every one features a stunning ocean view. Each is cooled by air conditioning and ceiling fans and houses its own well-appointed ensuite bathroom. The master bedroom is spacious and airy, with a King size bed, sitting area and beautiful antique desk. Its ensuite bathroom features premium fixtures including a long bathtub and shower.

Guests of Avalon by the Sea will receive a 15% discount at The Bay Course and The PGA Plantation Course, the latter of which is a quick walk from the villa. Beaches, a fitness center and tennis courts are a five-minute drive away. Kapalua’s many white sand beaches are ideal for surfing or simply relaxing. The closest town is fifteen minutes by car, and there you can stock up on groceries, shop or dine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Get into the aloha spirit with friends and family at Champion Ridge 10. Stylish and private, this retreat overlooking the golf course has room for up to six guests and a location close to the Mauna Lani Resort and gorgeous Hapuna Beach—perfect for a warm-weather holiday or a trip to mark a special occasion.

From the tranquil water feature at its entrance to its infinity pool with views of the fairways, this property sets a tone of calming luxury. Look beyond the course to the Kohala Mountains, the Pacific and Maui in the distance from the sitting area on the shaded lanai, a lounger on the sunny terrace or the hot tub. A barbecue makes it easy to try out fresh local seafood, while a media room, cable TV, sound system and Wi-Fi are ready to entertain in the evenings.

The villa’s recently renovated interiors were designed by Hawaii-based Eric Henderson, and feature nods to vintage island style alongside more modern touches. An open-plan great room with sliding glass doors leading to the lanai makes the most of the gorgeous views, and the cream-and-turquoise sitting and dining areas are chic yet inviting. Granite countertops and a breakfast bar lend both style and substance to the fully equipped kitchen.

The master suite at Champion Ridge 10 boasts a king bed, ensuite bathroom with a stone soaking tub and spectacular ocean and sunset views. The other two bedrooms each have king beds and ensuite bathrooms, plus private entrances that mean they could be used as honeymoon-style suites or quieter accommodations for in-laws.

Guests of this Big Island vacation rental are welcome to use the golf course, tennis courts, spa and fitness center at the nearby Mauna Lani Resort, though some activities or treatments may be at extra cost. Tote the provided beach gear—including umbrellas, towels, snorkel equipment, a cooler and more—to the resort’s beach or stop by the shops for a selection of gourmet foods from sandwiches to freshly made sushi.

listing.listing_description:
Located within the Four Seasons Hualalai Resort, this corner lot luxury villa overlooks the thirteenth hole of their prized, Ke’olu Golf Course. With privacy, provided by lush palm trees, this Hawaiian home features four beautiful bedrooms, an open-concept layout, and plenty of outdoor social space, making it the ideal home base for a family vacation, golf trip with friends, or a relaxing corporate retreat.

Earthy tones, rich wood, and splashes of local color decorate the spacious interior of this tropical paradise. The wide-open spaces and clear sight lines encourage a relaxing, social environment with a free-flowing vibe. Countless windows and openings frame endless ocean views in every room. The kitchen is a chef’s dream. With granite counters, an island, and a breakfast bar, there’s plenty of space for fun and function. The media room is a great place to unwind, with plush couches and a wide screen television, great for a family movie night. And, all four bedrooms come with a king or queen sized bed and en-suite bathrooms. Inside, the fully equipped kitchen comes with a coffee machine, dishwasher, ice maker, and formal dining space for eight. The living spaces are outfitted with Satellite television, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer. And, there’s a media room and office space to help keep you connected. Outside, the swimming pool, hot tub, hammocks, and sun loungers create the perfect oasis for enjoying Hawaii’s amazing climate.

Two 4-Seater golf carts are included with your rental for cruising the resort grounds in style, as are boogie boards, snorkel gear, beach chairs and yoga mats and props. If you are looking for the perfect home away from home, look no further. 106 Pu‘u Kole is truly “paradise found” and is nothing less than extraordinary!

You’ll also have shared access to all of the Four Seasons facilities. Within the resort, you’ll have access to several restaurants, tennis courts, their championship golf course, spa, the Hale Nalu Ocean Activity Centre, and their gorgeous, private beach. If you feel like exploring some of the other beachfront around the Big Island’s coast, there are several more within twenty miles. And, if it’s golf you’re looking for, there are three more courses, outside of the resort, within twenty kilometers as well.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

This daily fee includes access to the sports club, spa, golf course, beach and pool services, all resort restaurants (with the exception of members-only restaurant), ocean activity center, tennis club, kids club, and a resort-wide charge card and account. Note this fee is subject to change without notice; additional fees apply as appropriate. Please consult one of our Villa Specialists for more information.

During Peak and Peak of Peak times, guests may make reservations to use hotel amenities, dining and activities once they have been registered with the resort, but only up to 2 weeks in advance of their arrival date. During Festive Season, rental Guests have dining and activity reservation access when the resort announces the opening of their Festive reservations desk, at 7am HST on that date, approximately 3 weeks prior to the start of festive season.
Access to chaises on the pool decks will still be restricted during Peak of Peak, Peak and Festive seasons.

listing.listing_description:
This exceptional villa is located on the Byron Bay Shoreline south of Brisbane, within walking distance of Belongil Beach and Byron Bay town. Part of Kokos Beach Houses, the home is superbly appointed with high-end amenities for relaxation and dining, including a heated swimming pool, excellent media features, and a gourmet kitchen. The villa's style balances a classic beach vibe with modern luxury enhancements, offering a fresh and comfortable haven for families, groups of friends, or business travelers. Four ample bedrooms with flexible bedding arrangements accommodate up to eight guests in total comfort.

The ample, fenced-in yard and entertainment area invite you to long days and evenings in the open air. Dip into the sparkling swimming pool and sunbathe on elegant lounge chairs. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, fire up the barbeque grill and relish an alfresco meal. Then linger outdoors in the enchanting night, sipping Australian wine under the stars.

The main living room features vanishing walls on two sides, creating a graceful, indoor/outdoor space infused with an alfresco ambiance. The open-concept interior features a comfortable TV lounge, a dining table for eight, and a fully equipped kitchen with generous prep space. Central air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable in all seasons.

The bedrooms are airy yet cozy, with lovely timber accents and neutral color palettes that evoke a classic beachfront serenity. The master and primary guest suites open to balconies and feature queen beds and ensuite bathrooms. The other two guestrooms feature pairs of twin beds (which can be arranged as kings if desired) and share a bathroom and comfortable TV room.

From this private retreat, you're within easy walking distance of Belongil Beach, Byron Main Beach, and downtown Byron Bay. The sublime natural beauty of New South Wales is on full display at Arakwal National Park and Cape Byron State Conservation Area, both five minutes away by car. Golfers are about thirty kilometers to Teven Valley.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This extraordinary luxury villa on the island of Bali is located near Jimbaran Hill, just minutes from Padang Beach. Featuring beautiful alfresco living areas around a spectacular fresh-water swimming pool, along with exquisite interiors and five deluxe bedroom suites accommodating ten, Villa Una Nina is ideal for family reunions, destination wedding guests, or groups of friends. The vacation rental includes cook service, housekeeping, security, and a villa manager.

Surrounded by lush tropical gardens and featuring an ample terrace and lawn, the villa is perfect for special events, memorable receptions, or merely luxuriating in the South Pacific sun. Enjoy lovely days floating in the crystalline pool and relaxing on elegant sun loungers. Relish an alfresco lunch in the gorgeous dining pavilion, and sip afternoon cocktails in the lounge. The ample balcony on the villa's upper level is also beautifully furnished and features gorgeous views of the countryside.

Lovely doors join the pool terrace with the villa's cool, elegant interior, creating a lovely flow of space and air. Sip wine in the sumptuous living room, and gather in the dining room for an epic South East Asian feast. At night, watch your favorite shows and movies in the lounge and play a game of pool at the billiard table. The villa includes a fully equipped kitchen as well as a second-floor office space. The exquisite décor is at once elegant and naturalistic, with tasteful furnishings and artwork evoking Bali's cultural heritage and natural beauty.

The exquisite bedroom suites provide each guest or couple a dreamy private setting for downtime and rest. The master suite opens to a private garden with hammock, and features a canopied queen bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and an exquisite tub of terrazzo stone. Three of the guest suites have queen beds as well and share access to the balcony, while the fourth guestroom has two twin-size beds (convertible into a queen). All of the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms.

Villa Uma Nina enjoys a fantastic inland location on the southernmost peninsula of Bali, with world-class beaches within minutes in every direction, including Padang Beach, Jimbaran Beach, and Geger Beach. The towns of Kuta and Seminyak are also an easy drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
